feed.title: Lets discuss what to do if SHA256d is actually broken

entry.title: Lets discuss what to do if SHA256d is actually broken
entry.summary: In this exchange, Charlie Shrem reaches out to Rusty Russell to express his interest in a project. He asks if Rusty has a write-up available for him to read regarding this intriguing topic. Rusty responds by acknowledging that there are some areas that need improvement but provides a link to his Github repository where he uploaded the code and an unfinished paper with added graphs. The PDF is also included for easier reading.
